nodes.text: Danassic was a female individual who by the year 5 ABY was married to Grand Moff Randd of the Galactic Empire. As her husband was not prone to humor, Danassic told him that she believed he only laughed once or twice a year.
Danassic was first mentioned in the novel Aftermath: Empire's End, which was written by Chuck Wendig and released on February 21, 2017.
